archimate:ServiceJourney.name: Service Activity
archimate:ServiceJourney.documentation: A Service activity is the description of some required or expected behaviour, it could be viewed as a separate Journey embedded within the Journey. Activities will generally be included to clarify the purpose or behaviour of a journey by hiding some complex or detailed behaviour that would distract from the simple description of the journey itself. It is used to ensure appropriate levels of detail are communicated without cluttering the diagram. An activity should be described in its own diagram if its behaviour is known and if this will add appropriate value to the model i.e. contribute to the understanding.
